page.title: 18RUDDINGTON PEOPLE--BAKER
page.content: Every day {Mr. Joe Horspool, }the master baker of{Ruddington }bakes 7000 cakes and even more loaves of bread.He has 22 staff including many of his relatives to help him and modern machinery in a newly converted bakery. {Mr. Joe Horspool }is a national judge for baking competitions. When he judges bread he looks at the crust for a good brown colour and then cuts it open to see the texture of the bread as there must be no large holes. {Mr. Joe Horspool }was made a Freeman of the city of London because of his long connection with the baking industry. He has now opened a tea shop next to his bakery and it is very popular both for eating and as a meeting place for friends when they are shopping in the village and workers from the offices and small factories.
